requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | or AMD Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
